description:
If location, convenience, and access to amenities are important to you, this private three-bedroom unit is certainly worth consideration. With its ideal location, this property is situated in Rosebery and backs on to parklands, with a short distance to excellent schooling, public transport, and shopping centers.

Boasting three generous sized bedrooms and featuring a unique combination of space and natural light, this gorgeous residence has all the requirements for sophisticated family living in a great suburban location. The U-shaped kitchen is a statement in style without sacrificing on function, while the undercover patio flows off the living room and is the perfect way to enjoy the cool nights with family and friends. This house represents a fantastic opportunity for investors and first homebuyers, so why not indulge and reward yourself, with a home that provides everything the growing household could need for relaxed, private, and modern living.

Upon entry to the property, positioned with a view over the open plan dining and living area you will find a modern U-shaped kitchen, featuring a built-in serving bar, with ample cupboard and bench space, and overhead cabinetry. The kitchen is spacious, neat, and tidy equipped with a beautiful white tiled splash back, dual sinks, dishwasher, oven and a built-in shelf for all the family cookbooks.

With a neutral colour palette throughout, the open plan living, and dining area effortlessly adjoins the functional kitchen, providing the perfect opportunity to entertain and relax. This space offers durable floor tiling and neutral tones to give a minimalist look and feel with sliding door access to the patio, allowing for maximum airflow, and an abundance of natural light. To provide extra comfort, you will find air-conditioning throughout the property, which easily cools the entire house during the summer.

Sliding doors from the dining area provides easy access to the undercover patio, boasting durable tile flooring for easy maintenance, and a natural privacy screen creating the perfect place to gather with friends and family all year round. There is a storage cupboard for storing all your extra items.

Next up is the master bedroom featuring glossy tile flooring, black-framed glass louvred windows, a walk-through wardrobe and modern ensuite. The ensuite boasts a full-length glass screen shower, mirrored vanity, and toilet. The additional two bedrooms are generous in size and have built-in wardrobes. There is a good deal of natural light and fresh air along with air conditioning and a ceiling fan for extra comfort in all rooms.

The family bathroom boasts neutral tones, a full-length combined screenless shower and bath for relaxing in at the end of the day, a vanity, and toilet. There is floor to ceiling tiling for easy maintenance and glass louvres to ensure an abundance of natural light and maximum airflow. There is an internal laundry with external access at the side of the house, featuring a built-in sink and a linen cupboard located nearby to the dining area.

It is always nice to save time, and now you can reclaim your weekends with minimal yard and garden maintenance. There is also a dual undercover carport that generously fits two vehicles with plenty of room to accommodate additional vehicles by using the large, paved driveway.

This property is well-maintained and provides excellent value for its size and location. Offering a low-maintenance lifestyle, that will really set it apart from the rest, this residence offers a great investment and lifestyle opportunity. If you are after quality and something special, this is it. Get in quick as it will not last long.


Around the Suburb:
•Community atmosphere with parklands and play areas nearby
•Approx. 4 minutes to Bakewell Shopping Centre
•Approx. 10 minutes to Coolalinga shops
•Approx. 6 minutes from Palmerston CBD

About the Property:
Year Built: 2013
Easements: none found
Council rates: $1767 per annum
Body corporate:Whittles Body Corporate
Levies: $1157 per quarter
Rental Estimate: $580 per week
